gc01.cw.robf.controller

Class ManageUsersViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gc01.cw.robf.controller.ManageUsersViewController

  • public class ManageUsersViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Manage Users interface. Allows Managers to add (text entry fields), edit (in tableView) and delete users (selected tableView item). Includes filter for search and obscures passwords. Uses FXML template.

    TableView and editing adapted from http://docs.oracle.com/javafx/2/ui_controls/table-view.htm

    TableView filtering and sorting adapted from http://code.makery.ch/blog/javafx-8-tableview-sorting-filtering/

    Custom password change dialog implementation adapted from http://code.makery.ch/blog/javafx-dialogs-official/

    Workaround for JavaFX not refreshing tableView after modifying a field adapted from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11065140/javafx-2-1-tableview-refresh-items

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Rob Farthing

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Save button. If items have been modified, saves users to file and closes view.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • cancel

        public void cancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Cancel button. Closes view.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • viewLog

        public void viewLog(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses View Log button. Loads the Log view in modal and undecorated mode to force user to complete interaction with Manage Menu view before returning to Main view. Applies overlay CSS formatting to window as well as basic formatting.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • add

        public void add(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Add button. Takes values user has entered into text fields and creates a new user object if input is valid.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • delete

        public void delete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Delete button. If user has selected an item in the table, displays a confirmation dialog and if accepted, deletes the selected item.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • resetPassword

        public void resetPassword(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Change button. If user has selected a user in the table, displays a custom dialog to set a new password for the selected user. Obfuscates the entry.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Method automatically called by JavaFX Application class when loading a view. Initialises the tableView of users. Sets up filtered view for interactive searching on table columns. Also adds custom edit handlers to permit modifying users directly in table.
